info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 8 at 7:52PM CDT until April 13 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson MS
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi...
Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi...
Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County.
Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Pearl River near Carthage.
* WHEN...From late Wednesday night to early Sunday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of low areas along and near the river is occurring.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning to a crest of 18.0 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.water.noaa.gov/wfo/jan
The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 800 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING
